name: UsefulDesignPatterns
0:
”Alexa, ask Useful Design Patterns to tell me something”
”Alexa, open Useful Design Patterns”
”Alexa, tell me something from Useful Design Patterns”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: useful design patterns
des:
Not all the design patterns introduced by GoF are used equally. Some of them are used more widely but others may not, and there are some of them are even not recommended nowadays.
Useful Design Patterns skill will give you one of those design patterns that are actually useful.
